thread.title: Vehicle hits crowd at New Orleans Mardi Gras parade, injuring at least 12: media | Reuters
thread.title_full: Vehicle hits crowd at New Orleans Mardi Gras parade, injuring at least 12: media | Reuters

title: Vehicle hits crowd at New Orleans Mardi Gras parade, injuring at least 12: media | Reuters
text:
U.S. | Sat Feb 25, 2017 | 9:12pm EST Vehicle hits crowd at New Orleans Mardi Gras parade, injuring at least 12: media 
A vehicle plowed into a crowd watching a Mardi Gras parade in New Orleans on Saturday, critically injuring at least 12 people, police told local media. 
The number of people injured during the Krewe of Endymion parade could increase, according to a report in NOLA.com. 
(Reporting By Frank McGurty; editing by Diane Craft) Next In U.S. Magician's death by hanging in Hollywood ruled accidental by coroner 
LOS ANGELES The death of a world-class magician found hanged in his dressing room at a popular Hollywood nightclub called the Magic Castle was ruled an accident on Saturday by the Los Angeles County Medical Examiner's Department, an agency official said.
